titleStmt.title: The history of popedom, containing the rise, progress, and decay thereof, &c. written in High Dutch by Samuel Puffendorff ; translated into English by J.C.
titleStmt.author: Pufendorf, Samuel, Freiherr von, 1632-1694.
Chamberlayne, John, 1666-1723.

notesStmt.note: Translation by J. Chamberlayne of an unidentified work possibly written in German.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
